Parcel Capture 

0-		Diagram is comming from GetDiagram(string DiagramNumber) service method (currently it showing the SampleDiagram.tif)
1 -		Task from GetTasks service method (query  : select * from GetUncapturedparcels)
2-		Then it makes xml (CaptureDiagram.XML) in XMLFiles folders
3-		save the record(it save the data in xml)
4-		upload the record (SaveParcel service method) (StoredProcedure --- SaveParcel)(data goes to PARCEL_Approved table)

35904
